ValidationRule.description: Checks to ensure key fields are populated where the status of the LOA is LOA Accepted Awaiting Information
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(MainLOAStatus__c, "LOA Accepted Awaiting Information")
&&
(ISBLANK( Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c ) || ISBLANK(Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) || ISBLANK( Maximum_SLA__c ) || ISBLANK( Date_Last_Chased__c ) || ISBLANK( LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure there are values for date sent to provider, date received by provider, max SLA, date last chased, and provider on the financial product.
